title: Trust me you'll use it and you'll love it - DIYness of the Portal
name: Jai M.
comments: Comments: The best ever we have worked with - Townscript team and the ticketing portal! We have 12 events pan india all round the year and they manage seriously from needle to ship for us. HAIL TOWNSCRIPT !! :)
pros: Pros: * DIY (Do It Yourself) Thing! * Real 24x7 Dedicated Customer Support - Believe me always ready to help * Simplicity & Diversification of the portal * Efficient & Effective - both team & systems * Team has a solution for any kind of challenge * Timely and undelayed payouts * Marketing & Support Team
cons: Cons: * Organisers shall also have a control for sending promotional e-mailers and SMS's to the whole of the email database. Townscript can limit the frequency to be used for the same option to curb overusage of the same. Marketing team shall set a monthly calendar. * Payouts and Accounts - Gets disturbed in a way because whenever i ask for payouts, there's a lumpsum deduction from my existing events which pools up to the asked amount and in turn the balances for the events gets disturbed. Team, we seriously need to have a way out for this one and I'm sure team will have a way out. * Event creatives gets cropped badly.

title: decent software
name: Abid M.
comments: Comments: last year we had joined you'll exclusively and in our event graphic event from delhi's graphic was uploaded. we got it to notice but we were expecting compensation but no compensation was done, in the sense pushing event more aggressively, as for us it was our 1st event STILL we continued to be loyal and tied up with youll. this is the 3rd event and being a Foundation we expected a good support.
pros: Pros: database, when you talk about Marathon Events and reasonably an easy kinda software to operate and upload events.
cons: Cons: need more responsible managers for answering issues. reason mentioned in the General Comments. really need to look into this.

title: Lets You Focus On Your Event
name: Ishan S.
comments: Comments: I have been using townscript for 3 years now as our ticketing partners. We have been very happy with the overall experience.
pros: Pros: - Very Easy to set up - Handy mobile application - Periodic settlements and emails - Easy technical integration - The pop up payment modal is also very nice
cons: Cons: We have had a great experience from townscript. I don't think i can think of any cons from townscript.

title: Group Art Circle is rocking completely with Townscript
name: Debasree D.
pros: Pros: I really like the ease of use and systematic organization for every ticket link that i create. In Group Art Circle, we need to create tickets every weekend, so it is really easy to duplicate a past event and edit the information. Also i can go to the past events and pull up any info if i want.
cons: Cons: Really none. There is nothing i can say i would want to improve. I'm really happy with whatever Townscript is providing. I'm glad, i moved from instamojo to townscript.

title: Simple and User Friendly
name: Nirmal K.
pros: Pros: As the title says, it's so simple to use. The user interface allows you to navigate through the site's features in a easier manner. Very good Customer Support. Responses were quick.
cons: Cons: I felt that, payment gateway fee is a bit expensive. Next, this is not more of a Con I would say, I feel, a Mobile app version of Townscript would be an extra advantage for the users as well as for the company.

title: A startup that supports another startup
name: Salwat H.
pros: Pros: Good people Timely payouts They are always there to listen to you Technology updation Value for money And so many others. We were able to start our journey because of them. Their payment support made a big change for our startup.
cons: Cons: There was nothing as such that we did not like about Townscript. They are good and passionate in their job.

title: I am an active user of this platform. I like it very much
name: Shashidhar B.
comments: Comments: I use this platform to set up both online and offline events from time to time. So far my experience is great!
pros: Pros: Setting up the event is pretty easy. As a user, I find it convenient at all stages. The do-it-yourself feature is pretty good.
cons: Cons: Townscript is charging little extra money I feel. Sometimes, I had faced issues with responsiveness on all screens

title: Online Event Management could not have been better!
name: Amit K.
comments: Comments: We have been using Townscript for our events since last two year and have always liked the convenience it provides with respect to hosting an event. The web interface is very intuitive and effective. The tickets (if any) are generally resolved within hours of reporting - the cr team is really efficient.
pros: Pros: Easy Customization - One step customization of event details, topics, and ticket details Ease of use - Seamless process, eliminates any back and forth approvals etc Event Checking - This is an awesome feature to do online check-in of guests - saves a ton of manual time and effort
cons: Cons: A feature for aiding/assisting online marketing of events could be added. A mobile app to create event would be great.

title: Overall a fantastic experience
name: Venkatesh R.
pros: Pros: Customer Service is awesome. Would certainly recommend for others. Usability is great and response to the queries are great too.
cons: Cons: Nothing as of now. But there is a lot of scope for Improvement. There are few things that can be automated too!

title: Exceptional customer service !! I am very happy
name: Ramesh P.
comments: Comments: Many wishes to the team and a great product.
pros: Pros: all features are easy to use and have lot of features. liked it very much. they keep on releasing the new features which is the best part
cons: Cons: not found as of now not found any cons. so not sure what to write as a customer this one the first i recommend everyone

title: Simple & Effective
name: Rahul S.
comments: Comments: Digital marketing integration & support
pros: Pros: Ease of usage & setup Payment process Customer Support Overall it was an easy setup & execution for doing
cons: Cons: Some more features can be added Digital marketing part can be improved Otherwise nothing major cons in system

title: Functional Smart and Responsive
name: sanjeev k.
comments: Comments: I would want to control the size and in fact place pictures of the event in the event description section.
pros: Pros: Have used the platform for some events. They are always improving. Ease of operation. Anyone can do it. The payouts are very timely and never had any issue with them. Their response time is also nice.
cons: Cons: Their feature pages for the event details could do with a lot more presentation style options and formatting. The preview function could give a better consumer interface.

title: Feedback to townscript
name: Swati S.
comments: Comments: Good
pros: Pros: Easy to use, responsive, townscript have amazing audience size which is help to promote our events.
cons: Cons: Kindly share your contact details like phone or email etc.

title: Amazing gr8 support from Townscript team
name: Nataraj G.
pros: Pros: Customer support is very nice and wonderfull site for online registration and justbliked it.........
cons: Cons: All support is superb and very easy and understandable process ther is nothing to degrade this site

title: IDBI FLI SCM 2018
name: Prasanth P.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, dashboard, category changes, Cancellation and Refunds process. Proactive query settlements. Quick turnaroud even on holidays and late hours.
cons: Cons: Nothing material to mention here...

title: Pretty good
name: Dinesh K.
pros: Pros: Good Dashboard Good settlement system Good features Control and DIY feature Good invoicing system
cons: Cons: No sms facility Marketing can be better for the event Event app can be better in functionality Role distinction to be provided

title: nice!
name: Gauri B.
comments: Comments: NO
pros: Pros: I really like the platform becuase it is easy to use and takes very little time to book tickets for any event
cons: Cons: The platform has too many events to choose from and sometimes one can easily miss the location of the event.

title: WOW
name: Badri N.
comments: Comments: Keep up the good work!
pros: Pros: Very user friendly and has catered for all requirements of an organiser. Cloning of the event is a brilliant thing.
cons: Cons: None. Continuous updates have made life easier. Very friendly and prompt service also adds value to the service.

title: Easy to set up a ticketed event
name: Ramakrishnan K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Ease of use One can set up a ticketed event quickly Really good customer support so far I haven't come across a glitch till now
cons: Cons: Although there is a discounted ticket option, I'm not sure if there is a way to do multi-tiered pricing of tickets, like Early Bird, Phase 1, Phase 2 etc. ticketing I could do with more targeted marketing support for the kind of events I organise which are independent music live gigs. But I think that will happen as the event and audience base grows.

title: Great, flexible and fabulous.
name: Shubham S.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Feature Rich. Value for money. Fast and Reliable. Best Customer Support. Satisfaction..

title: I like this product.
name: Sandhya C.
comments: Comments: Good
pros: Pros: I have been using this for quite some time now. I am really satisfied with the product, hope they continue the good work.
cons: Cons: If they make it a bit more user-friendly I would be able to recommend it to my non-tech savvy friends as well.

title: Townscript has covered a variety of functions and use cases which makes it a great platform for events
name: Anukrit j.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: Its a great site overall
pros: Pros: All the functions are available and well implemented. The User Interface is pretty simple and easy to understand. All the payment methods are available
cons: Cons: I had entered the details for an event and I check the box for repeating event and filled the details accordingly. However, later we cancelled the event on the repeating day but it was difficult to edit on Townscript

title: Townscript has enabled us to conduct our alumni meet events flawlessly
name: Mudit J.
pros: Pros: Ensuring participation in event is an important aspect of success of event. Townscript has enabled us to book tickets in advance using multiple payment modes. Their ability to create custom forms and features like collecting platform fee and GST directly from registrants
cons: Cons: Payment gateway transactions fail sometime. That's it and everything else is great. No further cons.

title: One of the most user friendly platform
name: Suraj S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The best thing about this platform is tools provided to create an event withing very short steps, and also it provides the tools to sell tickets on your own website with minimum steps required to integrate.
cons: Cons: some customization feature need to be integrated since people selling on their website need to keep their branding for themselves.

title: I have never had an issue while using their services. These people are doing some great work.
name: Shikha V.
position: Senior Associate Content and Social Media
comments: Comments: I recommend everyone to try their services.
pros: Pros: It's quite user-friendly and I don't have to give tons of my time here. Plus their response time to the queries is quite quick.
cons: Cons: As far as now I have never had a major issue. Though, I was once stuck while in a hurry but got great assistance in a jiffy.

title: A smooth solution to book tickets for your events
name: Malkit S.
pros: Pros: * Easy to set up an event. * Booking ticket and payment process never failed. * Refund system works pretty well (though I used it just once.) * Discount codes are awesome (if you have one)
cons: Cons: * The search doesn't always return you appropriate results. * I have created an account on the web using FB login but whenever I try to log in on the mobile app, app crashes all the time. * Doesn't show you a consolidated list of events from the organizer which you are following, if we are following someone then it should have an option/menu where we can see some upcoming or past events from the organizer in the form of feed or something.

title: Simple and Effective Event Handler
name: Santosh K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Self-help with no strings attached. Easy way of creating events with ability to address indian currency and time system
cons: Cons: Need the process to be well defined. What happens to those who are in proprietorship segments. This needs more clarity as the tool expects you to enter GST.

title: Simple but powerful
name: Ajith L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to use, manage and organize events. Can create a different type of coupons for the different category. Good Customer support.
cons: Cons: we can't customize the window that is displaying the tickets by ourselves, but the Townscript team will help us to do this based on our request.

title: Fabulous!
name: Naquia S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It's easy to use. Very clean and minimalist, making it simple to understand and navigate.
cons: Cons: The categories as shown for users are not the same as shown for organisers while creating event, so it's difficult to add the appropriate tags to reach the target audience.

title: Excellent platform to reach the masses!
name: Bhushan C.
pros: Pros: Easy to create event and book the tickets. Anybody can create an event. Its Free! We can add customized questions to the attendee.
cons: Cons: I was unable to delete an event! I never found the delete event option. Don't know if it is there or not but I couldn't find it!

title: Awesome platform for booking tickets in very less time.
name: Sarvistha Y.
comments: Comments: I am happy using this platform.
pros: Pros: This platform has helped me a lot whenever I am looking for a weekend getaway. I recommend it to my friends.
cons: Cons: Till now, I haven't face any problem using this platform but I would really like to see more comedy events on the platform.

title: Very easy to use
name: Ankit M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: User friendly to post events. ease for payments as well. a very well known site for event in and around india.
cons: Cons: no cons to be posted as of now. works just fine for me. in case i find some cons in the future shall be posting them here without hesitation.

title: I really like Townscript.
name: Ankit M.
pros: Pros: Townscript has really helped me book all my event tickets for the entire last year. It's completely affordable and easy to use.
cons: Cons: I would love to be offered more discounts on the platform. Further, a little tweaking on the UX/UI, and a few more marathons on the platform would be amazing.

title: First time event organising expirience
name: Abhinav K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like the product as it's easy to customize and also make discount codes along with access to the app for ready reckoned...
cons: Cons: I am new to it and don't see any cons as of now and maybe we would be able to comment on this after a couple of weeks

title: I am happy with the platform.
name: Nishant G.
comments: Comments: I am satisfied.
pros: Pros: I have always used Townscript to book my treks. My friends and I are really glad that a service like this exists.
cons: Cons: I would love if there are more options for treks around Delhi on the platform. It would make my life much more easier.

title: Amazing Software for registering into cool events.
name: srinivasan G.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It lists the Team member's names and their Emails and also provides the option to send them an individual mail
cons: Cons: More focus can be provided to admins, like sending a group mail(making this option visible if there is a direct way to do this)

title: Well maintained payment platform
name: Omkar J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Provides multiple ways of payments Can customize alot of things.
cons: Cons: None for now..

title: Just Amazing!
name: Mehul J.
pros: Pros: Huge Customer Base Easy to Use Great user interface Real Time Customer Support Provide great marketing benfits
cons: Cons: Not meeting Expectations Not a place for small organisations Not fit for small events No great feedback in terms of huge sales

title: Overall a great platform to know about events
name: Sandeep A.
comments: Comments: It has always been good
pros: Pros: Ease Of Use. Various options available. Easy Of Payment Gateway.
cons: Cons: Sometimes app crashes on my Note 5pro mobile though never faced any issue while surfing website through my mobile.

title: Townscript Review
name: Vedant Y.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
comments: Comments: Amazing.
pros: Pros: This is probably the easiest to use payment portal you will ever use. Absolutely easy and very efficient. Love it. Would've appreciated a little more detailed docs as all questions are not answered but all in all, top class
cons: Cons: Lack of detailed documentation. All the queries I had weren't answered

title: Great platform!
name: Apoorva C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: Easy to use. Easy to edit even when event is live. Overall a very happy experience.
pros: Pros: For small businesses Townscript is so convenient and very user-friendly to create events. As some people don't have the capacity to reach people, this platform is worth your time!
cons: Cons: I have not faced any issues with the website while creating my event. A small suggestion: It would help if there is an option where Townscript could help in promoting events in your area. This could be a paid option from Townscript.

title: You Product is user friendly undoubtedly but you Customer support is Zero
name: Vishal S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
comments: Comments: Customer Support is Worst there is a delay and theres no helpline number neither. Not really Supportive expected much but not worth it. Eilier i use to use Meraevents but this time I used Townscript now I m repenting. You should at least have support email id. Which is not there.
pros: Pros: UI Part and Registration process is easy from the Customer Point of view. Payment gateways are good responsive.
cons: Cons: Organisers view not so user-friendly. But there should be some help support options. Payment Status after the Event needs to be notified.

title: Very easy to use self-serve event ticketing and registration platform
name: Sharayu R.
pros: Pros: I love the ease of creating an activity page on Townscript. It takes only 5-10 min to create / clone a new event. Secondly, I love their event mobile app to manage registrations on the go
cons: Cons: No dislikes as such, but they can allow the organizers to customize the order confirmation email by ourselves.

title: good experience in website.
name: Rajas D.
comments: Comments: 1) We are expecting a promotion from your side of our event.. townscript should send mails about our event to Email subscribers. 2) Seating arrangement layout should be apply for booking a ticket.
pros: Pros: support is good, email to participants, payment gateway,
cons: Cons: -

title: In love with Townscript.
name: Priyanka S.
comments: Comments: Good.
pros: Pros: Event tickets booking is no more a trouble now. I am glad that I came across this wonderful website.
cons: Cons: I would really love if the prices could go down a bit. I really want to attend almost all their events.

title: Townscript Review
name: Arun Kumar P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy to create an event, monitor and control.. can send notifications to all the attendees at a single push notification
cons: Cons: Addition of questions for ticket booking is not possible after the first ticket is sold, this seems to be reviewed, since in many cases the required questions will reveal over time

title: Robust platform
name: Shubham S.
pros: Pros: The ease with which I can navigate on the platform and the customer support offered by them is excellent
cons: Cons: There is absolutely nothing to dislike about the product. Every feature is quite easy to understand

title: So Far So Good
name: Karthik R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Easy, simple and intuitive. Clean Minimalistic Screen.
cons: Cons: Its been only a couple of days since I am using this software. No major negatives as yet.

title: Excellent!
name: Vikrant K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Very easy and user friendly! Keep it up.
cons: Cons: No Cons in the software. Appreciate if same day money transfer would had been possible.

title: Best website for creating events
name: Arjun S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: All the functionalities are included with payment facility and interactive User Interface. It gives a sophisticated look for any event.
cons: Cons: All the functionalities are included with payment facility and interactive User Interface. It gives a sophisticated look for any event.

title: Great user interface
name: Shivank A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I like the interface and timeline to which event make live on the website. Nice support and fast response for the event organizers
cons: Cons: Website have some problems in filter area when you filter free events whole section got wash up.

title: good ticketing website
name: Adit K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: ease of use and getting registered, getting the KYC details sorted
cons: Cons: only one day payout, wish we could have an option of selecting payouts on different days
